title: Affine term structure models driven by independent L\'evy processes
abstract: We characterize affine term structure models of non-negative short rate $R$ which may be obtained as solutions of autonomous SDEs driven by independent, one-dimensional L\'evy martingales, that is equations of the form $$ dR(r)=F(R(t))dt+\sum_{i=1}^{d}G_i(R(t-))dZ_i(t), \quad R(0)=r_0\geq 0, \quad t>0, \quad (1)$$ with deterministic real functions $F,G_1,...,G_d$ and independent one-dimensional L\'evy martingales $Z_1,...,Z_d$. Using a general result on the form of the generators of affine term structure models due to Filipovi\'c, it is shown, under the assumption that the Laplace transforms of the driving noises are regularly varying, that all possible solutions $R$ of (1) may be obtained also as solutions of autonomous SDEs driven by independent stable processes with stability indices in the range $(1,2]$. The obtained models include in particular the $\alpha$-CIR model, introduced by Jiao et al., which proved to be still simple yet more reliable than the classical CIR model. Results

translated_title: 由独立Lévy过程驱动的仿射期限结构模型
translated_abstract: 我们表征了非负短期利率R的仿射期限结构模型，这些模型可以作为由独立的一维Lévy鞅驱动的自主性随机微分方程的解得到，即形如$$dR(r)=F(R(t))dt+\sum_{i=1}^{d}G_i(R(t-))dZ_i(t), \quad R(0)=r_0\geq 0, \quad t>0, \quad (1)$$的方程，其中$F,G_1,...,G_d$是确定性实函数，$Z_1,...,Z_d$是独立的一维Lévy鞅。利用Filipović关于仿射期限结构模型生成器形式的一般结果，我们证明了在驱动噪声的拉普拉斯变换是正则变化的假设下，所有可能的(1)的解$R$也可以作为由驱动稳定过程的解的自主性随机微分方程得到，稳定指数范围为$(1,2]$。获得的模型特别包括由Jiao等人引入的$\alpha$-CIR模型，该模型证明比经典的CIR模型更简单且更可靠。
tldr: 本论文描述了由独立Lévy过程驱动的仿射期限结构模型，并证明了在驱动噪声的拉普拉斯变换满足正则变化的条件下，所有可能的解都可以通过驱动稳定过程的自主性随机微分方程得到。
